Package bt.processor

Class ChainProcessor<C extends ProcessingContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.processor.ChainProcessor<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Type of processing context
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Processor<C>

    public class ChainProcessor<C extends ProcessingContext>
extends Object
implements Processor<C>
    Base implementation of a generic asynchronous executor of processing chains.
    Since:
    1.5

      • ChainProcessor

        public ChainProcessor​(ProcessingStage<C> chainHead,
                      ExecutorService executor,
                      ContextFinalizer<C> finalizer)
        Create processor for a given processing chain.
        Parameters:
        chainHead - First stage
        executor - Asynchronous facility to use for executing the processing chain
        finalizer - Context finalizer, that will be called, when torrent processing completes normally or terminates abruptly due to error
        Since:
        1.5

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public CompletableFuture<?> process​(C context,
                                    ListenerSource<C> listenerSource)
        Description copied from interface: Processor
        Begin asynchronous processing of a given context. Returns a future, that can be used for - waiting synchronously for the processing to complete, - building processing pipelines and coordinating parallel executions, - completing or cancelling the processing.
        Specified by:
        process in interface Processor<C extends ProcessingContext>
        Parameters:
        context - Processing context, that contains all necessary data to begin the processing
        listenerSource - Listeners
        Returns:
        Future
